trans-unit.source: Displays data in a customizable grid.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta os dados numa grelha personalizável.

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessible client applications when a new cell becomes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Notifica as aplicações cliente acessíveis quando uma célula novo torna-se a célula actual.

trans-unit.source: This method converts the specified row and column indexes into `objectID` and `childID` parameters and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload twice using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Este método converte os índices de linha e coluna especificados para `objectID` e `childID` parâmetros e as chamadas a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>sobrecarga de método duas vezes utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>valores do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: The `objectID` and `childID` are determined by numbering only the visible rows and columns in their display order, counting the row or column headers if they are visible, and starting with 1.
trans-unit.target: O `objectID` e `childID` são determinados pelo numeração apenas as linhas visíveis e colunas na respetiva ordem de apresentação, os cabeçalhos de linha ou coluna de contagem se estes estão visíveis e começando com 1.

trans-unit.source: For example, if column headers are visible, the `objectID` for the first visible nonheader row is 2.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se os cabeçalhos de coluna estão invisíveis, o `objectID` para o nonheader visível primeira linha é 2.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> indicating the row and column indexes of the new current cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> indicar os índices de linha e coluna da célula actual novo.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property of cellAddress is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1. -or- The value of the property of cellAddress is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <> *> propriedade cellAddress é inferior a 0 ou superior ao número de colunas no controlo menos 1. - ou - o valor da <> *> propriedade cellAddress é inferior a 0 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> for a column header cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that is currently being painted.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> para uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que está atualmente a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the borders for the column header cells.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo internamente chama o método de AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle para determinar o aspecto dos limites para as células de cabeçalho de coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo normalmente utiliza o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>propriedade para o `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that that represents the column header border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o cabeçalho de coluna de limite estilo para modificar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the column header border style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que é utilizado para armazenar alterações intermédias para o estilo de limite de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is currently being painted is in the first column displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está atualmente a ser pintado está a ser apresentada na primeira coluna o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is currently being painted is in the last column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está atualmente a ser pintado é na última coluna no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que tenha o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*>propriedade definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style for the current column header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo do limite para o cabeçalho de coluna atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style for the upper-left cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo do limite de célula no canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The upper-left cell is the cell that is shared by the column header row and the row header column.
trans-unit.target: A célula do canto superior esquerdo é a célula, que é partilhada por linha de cabeçalho de coluna e a coluna de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> gets the value of this property while painting the upper-left cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>obtém o valor desta propriedade ao desenhar a células de canto superior esquerdo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the border of the upper-left cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo do limite da célula no canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo do limite das células no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedCellBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de AdvancedCellBorderStyle para personalizar o aspeto de limites dos células.

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o estilo dos limites utilizando os estilos incorporados, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo do limite das células no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the column header cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo do limite da coluna de células de cabeçalho de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of column header cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle para personalizar o aspeto de limites dos células de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o estilo dos limites utilizando os estilos incorporados, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo de limite de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the row header cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo do limite da linha células de cabeçalho de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of row header cells' borders in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle para personalizar o aspeto de limites dos células de cabeçalho de linha no derivada de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o estilo dos limites utilizando os estilos incorporados, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo de limite de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the option to add rows is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a opção para adicionar linhas é apresentada ao utilizador.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the user is allowed to add rows if both this property and the data source's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está vinculado a dados, o utilizador tem permissão para adicionar linhas se esta propriedade e a origem de dados <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade estiver definida como `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the add-row option is displayed to the user; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a opção Adicionar linhas é apresentada ao utilizador; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to delete rows from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador tem permissão para eliminar linhas do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the user is allowed to delete rows if both this property and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está vinculado a dados, o utilizador tem permissão para eliminar linhas se ambos os esta propriedade e o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade estiver definida como `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can delete rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador pode eliminar linhas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the AllowUserToDeleteRowsChanged property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade AllowUserToDeleteRowsChanged é alterado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether manual column repositioning is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o reposicionamento manual das colunas está ativado.

trans-unit.source: When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position.
trans-unit.target: Quando o reposicionamento de coluna está ativado, os utilizadores podem arraste um cabeçalho de coluna para uma nova posição.

trans-unit.source: Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que as colunas congeladas e libertadas formam dois grupos separados; os utilizadores podem reposicionar colunas dentro de um grupo, mas não é possível mover uma coluna de um grupo para outro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo não suporta a memória intermédia duplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>está definido como `true` no derivada de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, os utilizadores não irão receber comentários visual quando redimensionar linhas, colunas ou cabeçalhos ou quando reordenação de colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can change the column order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador pode alterar a ordem da coluna; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os utilizadores podem redimensionar colunas.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para impedir que os utilizadores alterar manualmente larguras de coluna.

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil, por exemplo, com as colunas de só de visualização onde os dados são carregados uma vez e colunas são redimensionadas nessa altura.

trans-unit.source: For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o redimensionamento de utilizador, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo não suporta a memória intermédia duplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>está definido como `true` no derivada de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, os utilizadores não irão receber comentários visual quando redimensionar linhas, colunas ou cabeçalhos ou quando reordenação de colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os utilizadores podem redimensionar colunas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize rows.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os utilizadores podem redimensionar linhas.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent users from manually changing row heights.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para impedir que os utilizadores alterar manualmente heights de linha.

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, with display-only controls where data is loaded once and rows are resized at that time.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil, por exemplo, com os controlos só de visualização em que uma vez carregar os dados e as linhas são redimensionadas nessa altura.

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Para o conteúdo da célula moldar em várias linhas quando uma linha é redimensionada, o estilo de célula em vigor para a célula tem de ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o redimensionamento de utilizador, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo não suporta a memória intermédia duplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de célula predefinido aplicado às linhas com números ímpares do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo mostra as células utilizando estilos indicados pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade, que herda estilos de outras propriedades do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> célula</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para células nas linhas com números de índice ímpares, os estilos especificados através da propriedade AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle é substituem os estilos especificados através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>e são substituídas pelos estilos especificados através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade, a obter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>com predefinição valores serão criados se a propriedade já não tiver sido acedida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode causar um impacto no desempenho quando ao obter esta propriedade de número de linhas.

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que possível, utilize um único <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>para definir esta propriedade para várias linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to apply to the odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a aplicar às linhas com números ímpares.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre quando qualquer propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade está definida para um novo valor ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade está definida para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>com, pelo menos, um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether all the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cells are currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se todos os o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> células estiverem selecionadas no momento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection does not perform efficiently with large selections.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>coleção não executar de forma eficiente em seleções de grandes dimensões.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> have been selected before you access the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection, check the return value of the AreAllCellsSelected method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se todas as células no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>foram selecionadas antes de aceder ao conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>coleção, verifique o valor devolvido do método AreAllCellsSelected.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, this method can cause rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, este método pode fazer com que as linhas a ficar sem.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> performance, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>desempenho, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the rows and columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*> property values of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para incluir as linhas e colunas com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*>valores de propriedade de <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all cells (or all visible cells) are selected or if there are no cells (or no visible cells); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se forem selecionadas todas as células (ou todas as células visível) ou se existirem não células (ou não visível células); caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns are created automatically when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as colunas são automaticamente criadas quando o <> </> *> ou <> </> *> propriedades forem definidas.

trans-unit.source: Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are set or changed.
trans-unit.target: As colunas são geradas automaticamente quando esta propriedade está definida como `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>propriedades são definidas ou alteradas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Columns can also be automatically generated when the AutoGenerateColumns property is changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: As colunas também podem ser automaticamente geradas quando a propriedade AutoGenerateColumns é alterada de `false` para `true`.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade é `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>alterado pelo que existem colunas que não correspondem às colunas da anterior <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>rejeitado valor, dados nas colunas sem correspondência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are not set.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é ignorada se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>Propriedades não estão definidas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When AutoGenerateColumns is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando AutoGenerateColumns está definida como `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo gera uma coluna para cada propriedade pública dos objetos da origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the bound objects implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se implementam os objetos vinculados a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>interface, o controlo gera uma coluna para cada propriedade devolvida pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents.
trans-unit.target: Cada cabeçalho de coluna irá conter o valor da coluna representa o nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property but set AutoGenerateColumns to `false`, you must add columns manually.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade definida, mas AutoGenerateColumns como `false`, tem de adicionar colunas manualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects.
trans-unit.target: É possível vincular cada coluna adicionada à origem de dados através da definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para o nome de uma propriedade exposta pelos objetos vinculados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the AutoGenerateColumns property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definição o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>no estruturador de formulários do Windows define automaticamente a propriedade de AutoGenerateColumns como `false` e gera o código para adicionar e vincular uma coluna para cada propriedade da origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: O código que é gerado no momento da conceção é equivalente ao adicionados manualmente código mostrado no exemplo seguinte.

trans-unit.source: It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the AutoGenerateColumns property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Não é igual a geração automática de colunas em tempo de execução que ocorre quando a propriedade AutoGenerateColumns está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the columns should be created automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as colunas devem ser criadas automaticamente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the AutoGenerateColumnsChanged property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade AutoGenerateColumnsChanged é alterado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of all its cells, including the header cell.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta a largura da coluna especificada para ajustar o conteúdo de todas as respetivas células, incluindo a célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil se quiser controlar quando uma coluna redimensiona.

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: A largura da coluna é ajustada apenas uma vez por chamada de método; Se o conteúdo da coluna mais tarde alterar, o coluna será automaticamente ajustar.

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Redimensionar todas as colunas, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir a coluna para redimensionar automaticamente sempre que alterar o respetivo conteúdo, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>propriedade ou coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o redimensionamento programática, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna para redimensionar.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexnão se encontra no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de colunas menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta a largura da coluna especificada utilizando o modo de tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil se quiser controlar quando uma coluna redimensiona.

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: A largura da coluna é ajustada apenas uma vez por chamada de método; Se o conteúdo da coluna mais tarde alterar, o coluna será automaticamente ajustar.

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Redimensionar todas as colunas, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir a coluna para redimensionar automaticamente sempre que alterar o respetivo conteúdo, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>propriedade ou coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga de permite-lhe especificar um modo de dimensionamento que calcula a largura da nova com base nos valores de um conjunto limitado de células, como as linhas apresentadas apenas.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Isto melhora o desempenho quando o controlo contém um grande número de linhas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o redimensionamento programática, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: A largura da coluna é ajustada apenas uma vez por chamada de método; Se o conteúdo da coluna mais tarde alterar, o coluna será automaticamente ajustar.

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Isto melhora o desempenho quando o controlo contém um grande número de linhas.

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column width will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit the contents of the largest column header.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta a altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna para ajustar o conteúdo do cabeçalho da coluna maior.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil se quiser controlar quando redimensionar os cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: A altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna é ajustada apenas uma vez por chamada de método; Se o conteúdo da coluna mais tarde mudar de cabeçalhos, o será de cabeçalhos de coluna ajustar automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir os cabeçalhos de coluna para redimensionar automaticamente quando alterar os respetivos conteúdos, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Para o conteúdo da célula moldar em várias linhas quando os cabeçalhos de coluna são redimensionados, o estilo de célula em vigor para a célula tem de ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta a altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna com base nas alterações para o conteúdo do cabeçalho da coluna especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil se quiser controlar quando os cabeçalhos de coluna redimensionar se apenas o conteúdo do cabeçalho da coluna especificada tiver alterado como resultado de edições de utilizador ou alterações a uma origem de dados vinculados.

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: A altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna é ajustada apenas uma vez por chamada de método se exigir a alteração de conteúdo; Se o conteúdo da coluna mais tarde mudar de cabeçalhos, o será de cabeçalhos de coluna ajustar automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir os cabeçalhos de coluna para redimensionar automaticamente quando alterar os respetivos conteúdos, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir os cabeçalhos de coluna para redimensionar automaticamente quando alterar os respetivos conteúdos, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.

trans-unit.source: To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga de permite-lhe especificar um modo de dimensionamento calcula as larguras nova com base nos valores de um conjunto limitado de células, como as linhas apresentadas apenas.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.

trans-unit.source: The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust.

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column widths will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the specified row to fit the contents of all its cells including the header cell.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta a altura da linha especificada para ajustar o conteúdo de todas as respetivas células, incluindo a célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite-lhe especificar um modo de dimensionamento que calcula a largura da nova com base nos valores de um conjunto limitado de cabeçalhos, tais como nas linhas apresentadas apenas.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Isto melhora o desempenho quando o controlo contém um grande número de linhas.

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga está protegida e foi concebida para lhe permite obter rácios de altura a largura de célula ideal num derivados de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: Se o `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` ou `fixedRowsHeight` parâmetros são `false`, a largura dos cabeçalhos de linha será calculada com as expectativas que irá chamar métodos tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>seguinte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o redimensionamento programática, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new width based on the current height of the column headers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the width with the expectation that the height of the column headers will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para calcular a largura da nova com base na altura actual dos cabeçalhos de coluna; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para calcular a largura com a expectativa de que a altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna também será ajustada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new width based on the current row heights; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the width with the expectation that the row heights will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para calcular a largura da nova com base no heights de linha atual; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para calcular a largura com a expectativa de que o heights linha também serão ajustadas.

trans-unit.source: rowHeadersWidthSizeMode has the value or .
trans-unit.target: rowHeadersWidthSizeModehas the value or .

trans-unit.source: rowHeadersWidthSizeMode is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: rowHeadersWidthSizeModeNão é um valor.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that the row and/or column header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta a largura dos cabeçalhos de linha com base nas alterações para o conteúdo do cabeçalho de linha especificada e a utilizar o modo de tamanho especificado, opcionalmente a calcular a largura com a expectativa de que as larguras de cabeçalho de linha e/ou coluna subsequentemente serão ajustadas.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil se quiser controlar quando os cabeçalhos de linha redimensionar se apenas o conteúdo do cabeçalho na linha especificado foram alteradas como resultado de edições de utilizador ou alterações a uma origem de dados vinculados.

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: A largura dos cabeçalhos de linha é ajustada apenas uma vez por chamada de método se exigir a alteração de conteúdo; Se o conteúdo da linha de cabeçalhos alterar mais tarde, o será de cabeçalhos de linha ajustar automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir os cabeçalhos de linha para redimensionar automaticamente quando alterar os respetivos conteúdos, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite-lhe especificar um modo de dimensionamento que calcula a largura da nova com base nos valores de um conjunto limitado de cabeçalhos, tais como nas linhas apresentadas apenas.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Isto melhora o desempenho quando o controlo contém um grande número de linhas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o redimensionamento programática, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the header with the changed content.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém o cabeçalho com o conteúdo alterado.

trans-unit.target: rowIndexnão se encontra no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of all rows to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta os heights de todas as linhas para ajustar o conteúdo de todos os respetivos células, incluindo as células de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil se quiser controlar quando redimensionar linhas.

trans-unit.source: The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Os heights de linha são ajustados apenas uma vez por chamada de método; Se o conteúdo das linhas posteriormente alterar, a linhas serão automaticamente ajustar.

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para redimensionar numa linha específica, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: To resize a subset of rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: Para redimensionar um subconjunto de linhas, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>de sobrecarga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir as linhas para redimensionar automaticamente sempre que alterar os respetivos conteúdos, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Para o conteúdo da célula moldar em várias linhas quando uma linha é redimensionada, o estilo de célula em vigor para a célula tem de ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga está protegida e foi concebida para lhe permite obter rácios de altura a largura de célula ideal num derivados de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: Se o `fixedWidth` parâmetro é `false`, serão calculados heights a linha com as expectativas que irá chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>método seguinte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o redimensionamento programática, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the first row to resize.
trans-unit.target: O índice da primeira linha para redimensionar.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to resize.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas a redimensionar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new heights based on the current column widths; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the heights with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para calcular os heights nova com base nas larguras de coluna atual; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para calcular os heights com as expectativas que também serão ajustadas as larguras de coluna.

trans-unit.target: autoSizeRowsModehas the value or , and is .

trans-unit.target: autoSizeRowsModeNão é um valor.

trans-unit.target: autoSizeRowsModetem o valor .

trans-unit.target: rowIndexStarté menor que 0.

trans-unit.target: - ou - rowsCount é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property of a column changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>propriedade das alterações coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how column widths are determined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica como as larguras de coluna são determinadas.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade permite-lhe configurar o controlo, para que as larguras de coluna são automaticamente ajustadas de forma para preencher o controlo ou para ajustar o conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes.
trans-unit.target: Ajustes do tamanho ocorrerem no modo de preenchimento sempre que a largura do controlo é alterado.

trans-unit.source: In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, whenever row heights change.
trans-unit.target: Nos modos de dimensionamento baseada no conteúdo, ajustes de tamanho ocorrerem sempre que o conteúdo da célula alteração ou, se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>estiver ativada, sempre que alterar heights de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: Alguns modos de dimensionamento baseada no conteúdo permitem-lhe limitar o ajuste de tamanho para as linhas actualmente apresentadas para aumentar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o modo de dimensionamento para uma coluna de individuais, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property value from the control.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido desta propriedade é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, que indica que a coluna herda o respetivo comportamento e a respetiva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>

trans-unit.source: Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: As colunas no modo de preenchimento dividem a largura do controlo disponíveis nas proporções indicado pelo respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>valores de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: A largura disponível para o modo de preenchimento é determinada subtraindo as larguras de todas as outras colunas da largura da área do cliente do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If this width is smaller than the combined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Se esta largura é menor do que o combinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>valores de todas as colunas de modo de preenchimento, é apresentada a barra de deslocamento horizontal, todas as colunas de modo de preenchimento são apresentadas com os respetivos larguras mínimas e redimensionar coluna do utilizador é desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo de preenchimento da coluna, consulte [modo de preenchimento de coluna no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Only columns with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: As colunas com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>valor da propriedade de `true` são redimensionado automaticamente, e alterar a visibilidade da coluna não irá causar redimensionamento ocorra.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, quando estão definidas para redimensionar automaticamente, o utilizador não é possível ajustar as larguras de coluna com o rato.

trans-unit.source: To adjust column widths programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> methods or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar programaticamente larguras de coluna, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>métodos ou a coluna de conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre dimensionamento de automática baseada no conteúdo, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição desta propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>, column headers are hidden, and at least one visible column has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref>. -or- The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> and at least one visible column with an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> is frozen.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref>, cabeçalhos de coluna estão ocultos e tem, pelo menos, uma coluna visível um <> </> *> valor da propriedade de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref>. - ou - o valor especificado quando esta propriedade é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref> e pelo menos uma coluna visível com um <> </> *> valor da propriedade de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> está fixa.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*>
