trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma célula precisa de ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar este evento para personalizar o aspeto das células no controlo.

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to paint other parts.
trans-unit.target: Pode células completos de pintura próprias ou paint partes específicas de células e utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>métodos para outras partes de pintura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>classe para controlos padrão utilizando o tema actual de pintura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [composição de controlos com estilos visuais](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver a utilizar [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], também tem acesso a uma grande biblioteca de imagens padrão que pode utilizar com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar este evento, deve aceder a célula através dos parâmetros do processador de eventos, em vez de aceder diretamente à célula.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma célula deixa o modo de edição, se o valor de célula foi modificado.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo irá tentar converter um valor especificado para um utilizador apresentado numa célula para um valor de célula subjacente real no tipo especificado pelo célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta conversão utiliza as propriedades de formatação do estilo de célula devolvido pelo célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the CellParsing event to provide custom value conversion to the required type.
trans-unit.target: Se a conversão padrão não satisfazer as suas necessidades, processe o evento de CellParsing para fornecer a conversão do valor personalizado para o tipo necessário.

trans-unit.source: Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: Os utilizadores podem introduzir o modo de edição utilizando o método especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>propriedade, e pode deixar modo de edição, consolidar as alterações a uma célula, movendo a outra célula ou, premindo ENTER.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the CellParsing event will not occur.
trans-unit.target: Premir ESC irá reverter as alterações para o valor antes de está consolidado e o evento CellParsing não ocorrerá.

trans-unit.source: The CellParsing event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellParsing ocorre apenas se o valor da célula realmente foi modificado, mesmo que o valor final é igual ao valor original.

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre também quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellParsing event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o evento CellParsing, pode converter o valor por si ou pode personalizar a conversão de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode converter o valor utilizando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>método com conversores de tipo à sua escolha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode permitir que o tipo predefinido conversores analisar o valor, mas modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Propriedades do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o que é inicializada utilizando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando converter o valor por si, substitua o valor inicial, formatado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade com o valor convertido no tipo especificado pelo célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para indicar que não são necessárias mais análise, é necessário, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: Quando o processador de eventos for concluído, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é `null` ou não é do tipo correto, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>é analisada utilizando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>método com conversores de tipo predefinido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida deste método analisa o valor a utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>as propriedades de estilo de célula transmitido suplemento</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor não for igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, o valor é analisado utilizando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>propriedade e os conversores de tipo passados suplemento</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar a conversão de um valor de célula para um valor formatado para apresentação, processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma célula estado é alterado, tal como quando a célula perde ou ganha o foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*> property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>propriedade de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new value or when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre quando qualquer propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida para um novo valor ou quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>com, pelo menos, um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um dos valores de um estilo de célula é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The CellStyleContentChanged event occurs when a property value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by one of the following properties changes: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> If one of these properties is set to a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the CellStyleContentChanged event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellStyleContentChanged ocorre quando um valor de propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>objecto devolvido por uma das seguintes alterações de propriedades:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>se uma destas propriedades estiver definida como outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, no entanto, correspondente *PropertyName* `Changed` evento ocorre, mas o evento CellStyleContentChanged não ocorrer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).
trans-unit.target: Para a linha, coluna e propriedades de célula, o nome do *PropertyName* `Changed` eventos começam com "`Row`","`Column`", ou "`Cell`" (por exemplo, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*> property value changes for a cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>as alterações do valor de propriedade para uma célula no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o texto da descrição de uma célula é necessário.

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellToolTipTextNeeded ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade está definida ou o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o evento CellToolTipTextNeeded, é apresentado o texto da descrição é especificar o processador de sempre que o ponteiro do rato está sobre uma célula e o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>valor da propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellToolTipTextNeeded é útil quando pretende apresentar as descrições determinadas pelo estado atual ou valor de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellToolTipTextNeeded também ocorre sempre que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é obtida, quer através de programação ou quando o ponteiro do rato entra numa célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>Propriedades para determinar o estado ou o valor de uma célula e utilize estas informações para alterar ou modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é inicializada com o valor da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>propriedade, o que substitui o valor de evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Processar o evento de CellToolTipTextNeeded ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar penalidades de desempenho de definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>valor para várias células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois da célula terminada a validação.

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Processar este evento é útil para pós-validação processamento o valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma célula perde o foco de entrada, ativar a validação de conteúdos.

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Cancelar este evento cancela as alterações à célula actual.

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando este evento é cancelado no modo de vinculados a dados, o novo valor não é enviado para a origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando este evento é cancelado no modo virtual, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>evento não será gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> event to perform post-validation processing.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>eventos para efetuar a pós-validação de processamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de uma célula é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The CellValueChanged event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellValueChanged ocorre quando o valor especificado para um utilizador está consolidado, que ocorre normalmente quando a célula de deixa de foco.

trans-unit.source: In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately.
trans-unit.target: No caso de células de caixa de verificação, no entanto, normalmente, deverá processar a alteração imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Ao consolidar a alteração quando a célula é clicada, deve processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: O processador, se a célula actual for uma célula de caixa de verificação, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e passar no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed.
trans-unit.target: Linhas no controlo não são automaticamente ordenadas quando um valor de célula é alterado.

trans-unit.source: To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a CellValueChanged event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para ordenar o controlo quando o utilizador modifica uma célula, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>método um processador de eventos CellValueChanged.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> requer um valor para a célula de modo a formatar e apresentar a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este evento no modo virtual para preencher as células com dados de um arquivo de dados personalizados sem causar linhas fique sem.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo virtual, consulte [modo Virtual no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar valores de utilizador especificado para o arquivo de dados personalizados, processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e um valor de célula é alterado e requer armazenamento na origem de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to update a custom data store with user-specified data.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este evento no modo virtual para atualizar um arquivo de dados personalizados com dados de utilizador especificado.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to retrieve values from the data store for display in the control.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>eventos para obter os valores do arquivo de dados para apresentar no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo virtual, consulte [modo Virtual no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Clears the current selection by unselecting all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Anula a seleção atual por unselecting todas as células selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, each column and row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é denominado, cada linha e coluna da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a seleção de todas as células atualmente selecionadas, exceto o for indicado, opcionalmente, garantindo que a célula indicada está selecionada.

trans-unit.source: A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header.
trans-unit.target: A `rowIndexException` valor de -1 representa um cabeçalho de coluna e um `columnIndexException` valor de -1 representa um cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil para limpar a seleção atual sem cancelar a seleção da célula, linha ou coluna indicado pelos índices de exceção.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>valor da propriedade permite a selecção de células individuais, este método define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A>propriedade de cada célula para `false`, excluindo célula na linha e coluna especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>permite de valor da propriedade completa linha ou coluna de seleção, este método define também o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>propriedade de cada linha ou coluna `false`, excluindo o linha ou coluna que contém a célula especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: A célula excluída, linha ou coluna pode ou não estar no estado seleccionado quando este método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este método seleciona-se a `selectExceptionElement` valor do parâmetro é `true`.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.
trans-unit.target: Consoante o modo de seleção, a toda a linha ou coluna pode também ser selecionada como resultado.

trans-unit.source: The column index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: O índice de colunas para excluir.

trans-unit.source: The row index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha para excluir.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the excluded cell, row, or column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to retain its original state.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para selecionar o excluídos célula, linha ou coluna; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para manter o estado original.

trans-unit.source: columnIndexException is greater than the highest column index.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexExceptioné maior do que o índice de coluna mais elevado.

trans-unit.source: -or- columnIndexException is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, columnIndexException is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - columnIndexException é inferior a-1 quando é ; caso contrário, columnIndexException é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexException is greater than the highest row index.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndexException é maior do que o índice de linha mais elevado.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexException is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, rowIndexException is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndexException é inferior a-1 quando é ; caso contrário, rowIndexException é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref> and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os utilizadores podem copiar valores de texto de célula para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref> e se está incluído o texto do cabeçalho de linha e coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo copia a representação de texto de cada célula selecionada para a área de transferência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este valor é o valor da célula convertido numa cadeia ou, para células de imagem, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Values are copied to the Clipboard in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> formats.
trans-unit.target: Os valores são copiados para a área de transferência no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue>formatos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>

trans-unit.source: These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Estes formatos são úteis para colar o conteúdo para aplicações como o bloco de notas, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], e [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo copia as células contidas no retângulo menor que inclui todas as células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data.
trans-unit.target: Linhas e colunas que não contêm quaisquer células selecionadas não são representadas no dados copiados.

trans-unit.source: Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer células não seleccionadas no restantes linhas e colunas são representadas por marcadores de posição em branco.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well.
trans-unit.target: Consoante o modo de cópia e o modo de seleção, os valores de cabeçalho para o copiados linhas e colunas podem ser copiados, bem.

trans-unit.source: When users copy content, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Quando os utilizadores copiar conteúdo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>para a área de transferência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This data object is retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto de dados é obtido a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Pode chamar este método quando pretender programaticamente adicionar o objeto de dados para a área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>método obtém os valores de células individuais ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir um ou ambos estes métodos em classes derivadas para personalizar o esquema das células copiados ou para suportar os formatos de dados adicionais.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as operações de área de transferência e formatos de dados, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição desta propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma coluna é adicionada ao controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de colunas apresentadas no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the ColumnCount property to 0 will remove all columns from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade ColumnCount como 0 irá remover todas as colunas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If ColumnCount is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se for ColumnCount é reposto para um valor inferior ao valor atual, colunas serão removidas do fim do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If ColumnCount is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se ColumnCount estiver definido como um valor superior ao valor atual, serão adicionadas colunas ao fim do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser utilizada com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>propriedade para criar uma simples <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>para apresentar e editar o texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.target: O número de colunas apresentadas no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre quando um propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade está definida uma coluna para um novo valor ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade para uma coluna está definida para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>com, pelo menos, um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique num separador entre duas colunas.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para personalizar o comportamento de dimensionamento automático que ocorre quando um utilizador faz duplo clique num separador de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode processar este evento para programaticamente redimensionar colunas em apenas o conteúdo das linhas que estão atualmente visíveis, evitando um impacto no desempenho com o comportamento predefinido quando trabalhar com um grande número de linhas.

trans-unit.source: The column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: A coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>propriedade não expande a área na qual um utilizador pode fazer duplo clique.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: Se a largura num separador foi aumentada mediante a utilização desta propriedade, este evento ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique limites entre o separador e a coluna adjacente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style applied to the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo do limite aplicado aos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade de ColumnHeadersBorderStyle é definida como algo diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>propriedade tem de ser uma cor do sistema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível definir esta propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>valor, que é um valor só de leitura que indica que o estilo do limite tiver sido personalizado através da utilização do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se estilos visuais estiverem ativados para a aplicação através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>propriedade é `true`, os cabeçalhos de coluna são desenhados utilizando o tema actual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is ignored for all column headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o valor da propriedade ColumnHeadersBorderStyle é ignorado para todos os cabeçalhos de coluna, exceto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, nos quais o tema não é aplicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: To force column headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: Para forçar a cabeçalhos de coluna para herdar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>que valores, tem de definir os valores no objeto columnheadersdefaultcellstyle é para os valores predefinidos indicado para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a herança de estilo de célula, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme and the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se estilos visuais estiverem ativados e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>está definido como `true`, todas as células de cabeçalho, exceto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>são desenhados utilizando o tema atual e o columnheadersdefaultcellstyle é valores são ignorados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the default column header style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo de cabeçalho de coluna predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre quando um propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade está definida para um novo valor ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade está definida para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>com, pelo menos, um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of the column headers row
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura, em pixels, da linha dos cabeçalhos de coluna

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the row that contains the column headers.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, da linha que contém os cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is 23.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 23.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum height of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum height of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é inferior a altura mínima de 4 pixels ou é maior do que a altura máxima de 32768 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight*> property changes.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna é ajustável e se pode ser ajustado pelo utilizador ou automaticamente é ajustada para ajustar o conteúdo dos cabeçalhos.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>, the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>, a altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna não pode ser ajustada pelo utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar a altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna programaticamente, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>método ou defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o modo de dimensionamento para os cabeçalhos de linha, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Para o conteúdo da célula moldar em várias linhas quando os cabeçalhos de coluna são redimensionados, o estilo de célula em vigor para a célula tem de ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre dimensionamento de cabeçalho, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo não suporta a memória intermédia duplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>está definido como `true` no derivada de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, os utilizadores não irão receber comentários visual quando redimensionar linhas, colunas ou cabeçalhos ou quando reordenação de colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref> value indicating the mode by which the height of the column headers row can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"> </xref> valor que indica o modo pelo qual a altura da linha de cabeçalhos de coluna pode ser ajustada.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeadersVisible property is `false`, a column whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> property is set to `true` can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking with the mouse cursor anywhere along the right border of the column to be resized.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade ColumnHeadersVisible for `false`, uma coluna cujo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>propriedade está definida como `true` ainda podem ser redimensionados na interface de utilizador (IU) clicando com o cursor do rato em qualquer lugar no limite direito da coluna a ser redimensionada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the value of one of the following column properties changes for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> in the control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado quando o valor de uma das seguintes propriedades de coluna é alterado para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>no controlo:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: Commits changes in the current cell to the data cache without ending edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Consolida as alterações na célula actual para a cache de dados sem terminar o modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to convert the formatted, user-specified value to the underlying cell data type.
trans-unit.target: Este método tenta converter o valor de formato, o utilizador especificado para o tipo de dados de célula subjacente.

trans-unit.source: To do this, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event, which you can handle to customize the type conversion.
trans-unit.target: Para tal, gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>evento, o que pode processar para personalizar a conversão de tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, default type converters are used.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, são utilizados os conversores de tipo de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: Conversion errors may result in an exception if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event is not handled to prevent it.
trans-unit.target: Erros de conversão visualizem uma exceção se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>evento não é processado para impedir que o mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: If the value is successfully converted, it is committed to the data store, raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event for non-data-bound cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é convertido com êxito, é consolidada aos dados armazenar, que gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>evento para não-vinculados a dados células quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>valor da propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: If the value is successfully committed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for consolidado com êxito, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the context in which an error can occur.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> valores que especifica o contexto em que pode ocorrer um erro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the changes were committed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as alterações foram consolidadas; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da célula não foi possível consolidar e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos ou o processador tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
