trans-unit.source: Gets the number of cells that satisfy the provided filter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de células que satisfaçam do filtro fornecido.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to determine the number of cells in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil para determinar o número de células num estado específico.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the number of selected cells, for example, use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o número de células selecionadas, por exemplo, utilize este método com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is typically more efficient than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Isto é geralmente mais eficiente do que utilizando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values specifying the cells to count.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> especificando as células a contagem de valores.

trans-unit.source: The number of cells that match the includeFilter parameter.
trans-unit.target: O número de células que correspondem a includeFilter parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: includeFilter includes the value .
trans-unit.target: includeFilterinclui o valor .

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a cell.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo que representa a área de apresentação para uma célula.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the entire cell bounds or the displayed portion only.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve os limites de célula completo ou apenas a parte apresentada.

trans-unit.source: To get the bounds of the cell contents only, use the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os limites da célula conteúdo apenas, utilize a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna para a célula pretendido.

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha para a célula pretendido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the displayed portion of the cell only; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to return the entire cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para devolver a parte da célula apenas; apresentada <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para devolver os limites de célula de todo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display rectangle of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o retângulo de visualização da célula.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que -1 ou superior ao número de colunas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é inferior a -1 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted values that represent the contents of the selected cells for copying to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores formatados, que representam o conteúdo das células selecionadas para copiar para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Este método obtém dados que representa a região definida pelas células selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Esta região é a mais pequeno do retângulo que inclui todas as células selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor para cada célula seleccionada nesta região é obtido chamando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region.
trans-unit.target: Valores de marcador de posição em branco são utilizados para não seleccionadas células nesta região.

trans-unit.source: This method combines these values into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> containing several formats for copying to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Este método combina estes valores para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>que contém vários formatos para copiar para a área de transferência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os formatos de área de transferência suportados incluem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref> that represents the contents of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"> </xref> que representa o conteúdo das células selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode*> is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode*>is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a column, as determined by the column index.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo que representa a área de apresentação para uma coluna, conforme determinado pelo índice de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna para a célula pretendido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the column rectangle visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> bounds; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to return the entire column rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para devolver o retângulo de coluna visível no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> limites; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para devolver o retângulo de coluna de todo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display rectangle of the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o retângulo de visualização da coluna.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexnão se encontra no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de colunas menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a row, as determined by the row index.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo que representa a área de apresentação para uma linha, conforme determinado pelo índice de linha.

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha para a célula pretendido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the row rectangle visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> bounds; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to return the entire row rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para devolver o retângulo de linha visível no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> limites; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para devolver o retângulo de toda a linha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display rectangle of the row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa o retângulo de visualização da linha.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnão se encontra no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the grid lines separating the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor das linhas de grelha a separar as células do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can set the GridColor property to any color when you use a single border; with other types of borders, the colors are specified by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir a propriedade GridColor é para qualquer cor quando utiliza um único limite; com outros tipos de limites, estão especificadas as cores pelo sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, the GridColor property is ignored, and the current theme's colors are used.
trans-unit.target: Se estilos visuais estiverem ativados para a aplicação através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, propriedade GridColor é é ignorada e cores de tema atual são utilizadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> or <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref> that represents the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"> </xref> que representa a cor das linhas de grelha.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.KnownColor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Drawing.KnownColor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value when setting this property has a <xref:System.Drawing.Color.A%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value that is less that 255.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade tem um <xref:System.Drawing.Color.A%2A?displayProperty=fullName> valor de propriedade que é menor do que 255.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns location information, such as row and column indices, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Devolve informações de localização, tais como índices de linha e coluna, fornecidos coordenadas x e y.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para determinar que parte do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo está localizado nas coordenadas especificadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call this method—specifying the coordinates of a mouse click—to determine the row and column indexes of the clicked cell or whether a header cell or scroll bar was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar este método — especificando as coordenadas de rato clique — para determinar os índices de linha e coluna da célula clicked ou se uma barra de célula ou deslocamento de cabeçalho foi clicada.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo> that contains the location information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo>que contém as informações de localização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a barra de deslocamento horizontal do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> representing the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> que representa a barra de deslocamento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of pixels by which the control is scrolled horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de pixels através do qual o controlo é deslocar horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels by which the control is scrolled horizontally.
trans-unit.target: O número de pixels através do qual o controlo é deslocar horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified cell of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Invalidam a célula especificada do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>, forçando-lo para ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil para forçar um repaint de célula em condições que normalmente não poderia causar uma célula para ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode utilizar este método com um tipo de célula personalizado que altera o aspecto como resultado de eventos externos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about painting and invalidation, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o desenho e invalidação, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> para invalidar.

trans-unit.target: dataGridViewCellnão pertence à .

trans-unit.target: dataGridViewCellis .

trans-unit.target: Invalida célula com os índices linha e coluna especificadas, forçando-lo para ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil para forçar um repaint de célula em condições que normalmente não poderia causar uma célula para ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna da célula para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que -1 ou superior ao número de colunas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é inferior a -1 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.target: Invalida a coluna especificada do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>, forçando-lo para ser repainted.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o desenho e invalidação, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexnão se encontra no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de colunas menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified row of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Invalida a linha especificada do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>, forçando-lo para ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to force a row to repaint itself.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para forçar uma linha para repaint próprio.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful in owner-drawing scenarios where you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil em cenários de desenho de proprietário onde para processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>

trans-unit.source: For more information about painting and invalidation, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o desenho e invalidação, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnão se encontra no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current cell has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula actual tem alterações não confirmadas.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not bound to data, the cell edit is considered committed when the user moves to another cell.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>não está vinculado a dados, a edição de célula é considerada consolidada quando o utilizador move a outra célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If row headers are visible, a pencil glyph is present in the header for the row that contains a cell with uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Se os cabeçalhos de linha estão visíveis, um glifo lápis se encontra presente no cabeçalho para a linha que contém uma célula com alterações não confirmadas.

trans-unit.source: If IsCurrentCellDirty is `true` and the current cell hosts an editing control, you can retrieve it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se for IsCurrentCellDirty `true` e célula actual aloja um controlo de edição, pode obtê-lo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula actual tem alterações não confirmadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the currently active cell is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula actualmente activo está a ser editada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> that has focus is always in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>que tem o foco está sempre no modo de edição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: If the current cell hosts an editing control and IsCurrentCellInEditMode is `true`, you can retrieve the editing control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula actual aloja um controlo de edição e IsCurrentCellInEditMode `true`, pode obter o controlo de edição através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is being edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver a ser editada célula actual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a linha actual tem alterações não confirmadas.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` when the pencil glyph is displayed in the row.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve `true` quando o glifo lápis é apresentado na linha.

trans-unit.source: By default, the IsCurrentRowDirty property will always equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property, unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a data source that supports editing, or virtual mode has been implemented to use row-level commit scope.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, a propriedade IsCurrentRowDirty será sempre igual ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>propriedade, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está vinculado a uma origem de dados que suporta a edição ou modo virtual tenha sido implementada a utilizar o âmbito de consolidação de ao nível da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will evaluate this property at the row level.
trans-unit.target: Nestes casos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>irá avaliar esta propriedade ao nível da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the user navigates away from the row, the control commits all row changes.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador navega para fora de linha, o controlo consolida todas as alterações de linha.

trans-unit.source: The user can also press CTRL+ENTER to commit row changes without leaving the row.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador também pode premir CTRL + ENTER para confirmar alterações de linha sem sair a linha.

trans-unit.source: To commit row changes programmatically, call the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para confirmar alterações de linha através de programação, chame o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your data source is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, you can also call<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>também pode chamar<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current row has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha actual tem alterações não confirmadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um caráter for uma entrada de carateres que a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> reconhece.

trans-unit.source: A character is recognized as an input character depending on whether the control is in edit mode and whether the current editing control can accept the character.
trans-unit.target: Um caráter é reconhecido como um carácter de entrada, dependendo se o controlo está em modo de edição e se o controlo de edição atual pode aceitar o caráter.

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: O caráter para testar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is recognized as an input character; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter é reconhecido como um carácter de entrada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamentos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the column and row with the specified indexes.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um indexador para obter ou definir a célula localizada na intersecção da coluna e linha com os índices especificados.

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Este indexador é uma alternativa células através de acesso a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> na localização especificada.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que 0 ou superior ao número de colunas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é inferior a 0 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the row with the specified index and the column with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um indexador para obter ou definir a célula localizada na intersecção da linha com o índice especificado e a coluna com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Este indexador é uma alternativa células através de acesso a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O nome da coluna que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> na localização especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> at a time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador tem permissão para selecionar mais do que uma célula, linha ou coluna do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> cada vez.

trans-unit.source: When the MultiSelect property is set to `true`, multiple elements (cells, rows, or columns) can be selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade MultiSelect é está definida como `true`, vários elementos (células, linhas ou colunas) podem ser selecionados a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To select multiple elements, the user can hold down the CTRL key while clicking the elements to select.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar vários elementos, o utilizador pode mantenha premida a tecla CTRL enquanto clica os elementos para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: Consecutive elements can be selected by clicking the first element to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last element to select.
trans-unit.target: É possível selecionar elementos consecutivos clicando primeiro elemento para selecionar e, em seguida, ao premir a tecla SHIFT, clicando em último elemento para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: The selection scope is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O âmbito de seleção é baseado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the user can select multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, o utilizador pode seleccionar várias colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the MultiSelect property to allow a user to select multiple elements in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control and perform an operation on all the selected elements.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a propriedade MultiSelect é para permitir que um utilizador selecionar vários elementos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar e efetuar uma operação em todos os elementos selecionados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, the user could select multiple cells and then right-click a selected cell to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks to perform on the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o utilizador pode selecionar várias células e, em seguida, faça duplo clique uma célula selecionada para apresentar um menu de atalho que apresenta um conjunto de tarefas a executar nas células selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: To determine which cells, rows, or columns are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, you can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar as células, linhas ou colunas são selecionadas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, pode aceder a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of selected cells, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A> method with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o número de células selecionadas, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A>método com um valor de argumento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of selected rows and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of columns.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>método para obter o número de linhas selecionadas e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A>método para obter o número de colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are more efficient than accessing the collections directly when working with large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos são mais eficientes do que as coleções aceder diretamente ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da linha para novos registos.

trans-unit.source: Unless <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `false`, the value of this property is equal to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: A menos que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>é `false`, o valor desta propriedade é igual ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row for new records, or -1 if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de novos registos ou -1 se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the user navigates to the new row at the bottom of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e o utilizador navega para a nova linha na parte inferior a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in virtual mode, this event allows a new entry to be created in the data store for the new row, and it also allows for the row to be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está no modo virtual, este evento permite uma nova entrada seja criado no arquivo de dados para a nova linha e também permite para a linha ser preenchida com valores predefinidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that the current cell has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que célula actual tem alterações não confirmadas.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to allow custom cell types to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> when they have uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser utilizado para permitir que os tipos de célula personalizado notificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>quando têm alterações não confirmadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the cell has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação iria consolidar um valor de célula ou introduza o modo de edição, mas impede a um erro na origem de dados a ação e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos ou o processador tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The column changed from read-only to read/write, enabling the current cell to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged"> </xref> eventos e atualizações de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor*>propriedade se o cursor foi alterado no código de utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property value depending on the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar as alterações a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>valor da propriedade consoante a localização do ponteiro do rato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property stores the normal value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property and ignores the control's changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>propriedade armazena o valor normal a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>propriedade e ignora é alterada o controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged> event occurs, and it updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property, if necessary, in addition to invoking any event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged>evento ocorre e atualiza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>propriedade, se necessário, para além de invocar a quaisquer processadores de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged>

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Binding operations occur when the data changes while a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is in use.
trans-unit.target: As operações de enlace ocorrem quando os dados mudam enquanto um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>está a ser utilizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will update its view and raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> event when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>evento ocorre, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>irá atualizar a vista e emitir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete>evento quando estiver concluído.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but upon entering focus, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O controlo está configurado para introduzir o modo de edição quando recebe o foco, mas após introduzir o foco, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>propriedade da célula actual não indica uma classe que deriva de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> e implementa <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O controlo está configurado para introduzir o modo de edição quando recebe o foco, mas a inicialização do valor da célula edição falhada e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos ou o processador tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de exceção, normalmente, pode ser convertido no tipo <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged> event, this method uses the new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>properties.
trans-unit.target: Para além de gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>evento, este método utiliza o novo valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>propriedade para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>Propriedades de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>objectos devolvidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>

trans-unit.source: This action would cause the control to enter edit mode but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação faria com que o controlo introduzir o modo de edição mas inicialização do valor da célula edição falhada e o mesmo não se nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos ou o processador tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de exceção, normalmente, pode ser convertido no tipo <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The `clipBounds` parameter represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: O `clipBounds` parâmetro representa a área do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>que tem de ser repainted.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um utilizador abrange todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>com outra janela e, em seguida, uncovers, em seguida, `clipBounds` representa todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: Se um utilizador abrange uma área de pequena a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>e, em seguida, uncovers, em seguida, `clipBounds` representa a área de pequena que foi abrangida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the background.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para a imagem de fundo de pintura.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área na qual são desenhadas células.

trans-unit.source: Processes the A key.
trans-unit.target: Processa a chave de um.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses CTRL+A and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve `true` quando o utilizador premir CTRL + A e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, this selects all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, esta seleciona todas as células no controlo.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave ou chaves para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes keys used for navigating in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Processa as chaves utilizadas para navegar no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the key-processing method appropriate to the key pressed (for example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A> method when F2 is pressed) and returns the return value of that method.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o método de processamento de chave adequada para a chave premida (por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A>método quando é premido F2) e devolve o valor de retorno deste método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre a chave que foi premida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The key pressed would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave premida faria com que o controlo introduzir o modo de edição, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>propriedade da célula actual não indica uma classe que deriva de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> e implementa <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação iria consolidar um valor de célula ou introduza o modo de edição, mas impede a um erro na origem de dados a ação e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos ou o processador tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The DELETE key would delete one or more rows, but an error in the data source prevents the deletion and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - eliminar a chave deveria eliminá uma ou mais linhas, mas a eliminação de impede que um erro na origem de dados e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos ou o processador tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes the DELETE key.
trans-unit.target: Processa a chave de eliminação.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses DELETE to delete rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve `true` quando o utilizador premir a eliminar para eliminar linhas no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The user can delete rows if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode eliminar linhas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the data source must also be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está vinculado a dados, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade da origem de dados também tem de ser definida `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado no modo de edição para processar a entrada de teclado que não é processada pelo controlo de edição alojado.

trans-unit.source: The DOWN ARROW key would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the new current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação iria consolidar um valor de célula ou introduza o modo de edição, mas impede a um erro na origem de dados a ação e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos ou o processador tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A chave de seta para a direita faria com que o controlo introduzir o modo de edição, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>propriedade da célula actual novo indicam uma classe que deriva de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> e implementa <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação iria consolidar um valor de célula ou introduza o modo de edição, mas impede a um erro na origem de dados a ação e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos ou o processador tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes the 0 key.
trans-unit.target: Chave de processos a 0.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave ou chaves para processar.

trans-unit.source: The 0 key would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave de 0 causaria o controlo introduzir o modo de edição, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>propriedade da célula actual não indica uma classe que deriva de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> e implementa <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would cause the control to enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
