trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador pode editar as células do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: A cell is read-only if the value of the ReadOnly property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Uma célula é só de leitura, se o valor da propriedade ReadOnly é `true` para a célula, linha da célula, coluna da célula ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user cannot edit the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador não é possível editar as células do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, a célula actual está no modo de edição e a célula actual contém alterações que não podem ser consolidadas.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade fará com que o controlo introduzir o modo de edição, mas a inicialização do valor da célula edição falhada e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos ou o processador tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de exceção, normalmente, pode ser convertido no tipo <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o valor da célula actual com o valor de célula subjacente quando a célula está no modo de edição, eliminar qualquer valor anterior.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método para forçar uma célula para atualizar o respetivo valor de apresentação em modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando um processo externo modifica o valor da célula e de que pretende notificar o utilizador da alteração, mesmo quando uma alteração de utilizador especificado não se tenha perdida como resultado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver êxito; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event occurred.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Repõe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>propriedade para o valor predefinido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Although this method behaves as described, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A> property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: Embora este método funciona conforme descrito, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>propriedade não é relevante para este controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o menu de atalho de uma linha é necessário.

trans-unit.source: The RowContextMenuStripNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O evento RowContextMenuStripNeeded ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade está definida ou o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Handling the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: Processar o evento RowContextMenuStripNeeded é útil quando pretende apresentar um menu de atalho determinado pelo estado atual de uma linha ou valores que nele contidos.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o evento RowContextMenuStripNeeded, é apresentado o menu de atalho que especificou o processador de sempre que o utilizador right-clicks uma linha, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>substitui o menu de atalho para a célula específica que foi clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The RowContextMenuStripNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: O evento RowContextMenuStripNeeded também ocorre sempre que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é obtida, quer através de programação ou quando o utilizador right-clicks uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para determinar o estado de uma linha ou valores contém e utilize estas informações para alterar ou modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é inicializada com o valor da linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade, o que substitui o valor de evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Processar o evento de RowContextMenuStripNeeded ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar penalidades de desempenho de definir a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>valor para várias linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de linhas apresentadas no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If RowCount is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se a contagem de linhas está definida para um valor inferior ao valor atual, as linhas serão removidas do fim do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If RowCount is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se a contagem de linhas está definida para um valor superior ao valor atual, linhas serão adicionadas ao fim do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The additional rows are based on the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: As linhas adicionais baseiam-se na linha especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the RowCount property to 0, all rows will be removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade RowCount como 0, todas as linhas serão removidas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Isto é equivalente ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`, you cannot set RowCount to 0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>é `true`, não é possível definir RowCount como 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to remove all rows except the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para remover todas as linhas, exceto a linha para novos registos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A> has the same result as setting RowCount to 1 in this case, but is much faster.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>tem o mesmo resultado como definição de contagem de linhas como 1, neste caso, mas é muito mais rápido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RowCount property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RowCount pode ser utilizada com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>propriedade para criar uma simples <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>para apresentar e editar o texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the RowCount property to a value greater than 0 for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control without columns, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is added automatically.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade RowCount para um valor superior a 0 para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo sem colunas, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>é adicionado automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to display in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas a apresentar no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value is less than 1 and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor especificado é inferior a 1 e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>está definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>propriedade para um alterações de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre quando qualquer propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade para uma linha está definida como um valor novo ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade para uma linha está definida para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>com, pelo menos, um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> precisa de determinar se a linha actual tem alterações não confirmadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: By default, this event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, este evento define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true` se quaisquer células na linha atual tem sido modificadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>evento ocorrer quando o utilizador reverte as edições de uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>

trans-unit.source: Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Os utilizadores podem reverter as edições de uma linha, premindo a tecla ESC duas vezes quando uma célula está no modo de edição ou uma vez fora do modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope.
trans-unit.target: Este evento pode ser utilizado para personalizar o âmbito de consolidação no modo virtual, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para o valor correto, consoante o âmbito de confirmação que escolheu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique no separador entre duas linhas.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para personalizar o comportamento de dimensionamento automático que ocorre quando um utilizador faz duplo clique num separador de linha.

trans-unit.source: The row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: A linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>propriedade não expande a área na qual um utilizador pode fazer duplo clique.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: Se a altura de um separador foi aumentada mediante a utilização desta propriedade, este evento ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique limites entre o separador e a coluna adjacente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight*>

trans-unit.source: The divider height is modified by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A altura do separador é modificada através da definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row receives input focus but before it becomes the current row.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma linha recebe o foco de entrada, mas antes, torna-se a linha atual.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>inicialmente estiver carregado, bem como quando o utilizador seleciona uma linha que não seja a linha atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>propriedade é atualizada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of the newly-entered row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property within the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o índice da linha recentemente introduzido, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade dentro do processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText*> property of a row changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText*>propriedade das alterações de uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o texto de erro de uma linha é necessário.

trans-unit.source: The RowErrorTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O evento RowErrorTextNeeded ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo está definido ou o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling the RowErrorTextNeeded event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: Processar o evento RowErrorTextNeeded é útil quando pretende determinar o erro para uma linha, consoante o estado e os valores que nele contidos.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the RowErrorTextNeeded event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o evento RowErrorTextNeeded e especifique o texto de erro do processador, uma imagem de erro é apresentado no cabeçalho de linha, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador move o ponteiro do rato sobre o glifo de erro, o texto de erro é apresentado numa descrição.

trans-unit.source: The RowErrorTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: O evento RowErrorTextNeeded também ocorre sempre que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é obtida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para determinar o estado de uma linha ou valores contém e utilize estas informações para alterar ou modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é inicializada com o valor da linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>propriedade, o que substitui o valor de evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the RowErrorTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Processar o evento de RowErrorTextNeeded ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar penalidades de desempenho de definir a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>valor para várias linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando faz duplo clique num cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo do limite das células de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: If the RowHeadersBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade de RowHeadersBorderStyle é definida como algo diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>propriedade tem de ser uma cor do sistema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível definir esta propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>valor, que é um valor só de leitura que indica que o estilo do limite tiver sido personalizado através da utilização do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the row headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se estilos visuais estiverem ativados para a aplicação através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>propriedade é `true`, os cabeçalhos de linha são desenhados utilizando o tema actual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the RowHeadersBorderStyle property is ignored for all row headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o valor da propriedade RowHeadersBorderStyle é ignorado para a linha todos os cabeçalhos, exceto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, nos quais o tema não é aplicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição desta propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo predefinido aplicado às células de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido por esta propriedade tem os seguintes valores de propriedade inicial.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: |DataGridViewCellStyle property|Default value| |------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName>| These values automatically override the values set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | O DataGridViewCellStyle propriedade | Valor predefinido | |------------------------------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>| O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>| O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>| O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>| O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>| O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName>| Estes valores substituem automaticamente os valores definidos através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> trans-unit.source: To force row headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: Para forçar os cabeçalhos de linha para herdar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>que valores, tem de definir os valores no objeto RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle é para os valores predefinidos indicado para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a herança de estilo de célula, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the default style applied to the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo predefinido aplicado às células de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre quando uma propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade está definida para um novo valor ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade está definida para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>com, pelo menos, um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column that contains row headers is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a coluna que contém os cabeçalhos de linha é apresentada.

trans-unit.source: If the RowHeadersVisible property is `false`, a row whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A> property is set to `true`can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking the mouse cursor anywhere along the bottom border of the row to be resized.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade RowHeadersVisible for `false`, uma linha cuja <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`ainda podem ser redimensionados na interface de utilizador (IU) clicando o cursor do rato em qualquer lugar no limite inferior da linha para ser redimensionada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column that contains row headers is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for apresentada a coluna que contém os cabeçalhos de linha; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode*>propriedade está definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column that contains the row headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura, em pixels, da coluna que contém os cabeçalhos de linha.

trans-unit.source: The RowHeadersWidth property can be used to resize the row header column to a specified width.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RowHeadersWidth é pode ser utilizada para redimensionar a coluna de cabeçalho de linha para uma largura especificada.

trans-unit.source: To adjust the width of this column to fit the contents of the row header cells, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar a largura desta coluna para ajustar o conteúdo de células de cabeçalho de linha, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the column that contains row headers.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, da coluna que contém os cabeçalhos de linha.

trans-unit.source: The default is 43.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 43.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum width of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum width of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é inferior a largura mínima de 4 pixels ou é maior do que a largura máxima de 32768 pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width of the row headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a largura dos cabeçalhos de linha é ajustável e se pode ser ajustado pelo utilizador ou automaticamente é ajustada para ajustar o conteúdo dos cabeçalhos.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to an automatic sizing mode, the width of the row headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade está definida como um modo de dimensionamento automático, a largura dos cabeçalhos de linha não pode ser ajustada pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the row headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar a altura dos cabeçalhos de linha programaticamente, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>método ou defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the column headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o modo de dimensionamento para os cabeçalhos de coluna, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre dimensionamento de cabeçalho, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo não suporta a memória intermédia duplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>está definido como `true` no derivada de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, os utilizadores não irão receber comentários visual quando redimensionar linhas, colunas ou cabeçalhos ou quando reordenação de colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value indicating the mode by which the width of the row headers can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> valor que indica o modo pelo qual a largura dos cabeçalhos de linha pode ser ajustada.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição desta propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height*> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height*>propriedade para um alterações de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when information about row height is requested.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando são pedidas informações sobre a altura de linha.

trans-unit.source: This event is useful for preserving custom row heights after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é útil para preservar heights de linha personalizadas após uma operação de ordenação.

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because sorting operations are normally handled by the data source, which does not keep track of the correspondence between rows of data and rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Isto é necessário porque as operações de ordenação normalmente são processadas pela origem de dados, que não manter controlar da correspondência de e-mail entre as linhas de dados e as linhas no controlo.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade foi definida ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, you provide your own data store and sorting operations.
trans-unit.target: No caso desta última opção, forneça o suas próprias arquivo de dados e a ordenação de operações.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> event to store updated height information when the user changes a row height.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>eventos para armazenar informações de altura atualizado quando o utilizador altera a altura de uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>

trans-unit.source: Use RowHeightInfoNeeded to retrieve the stored height information when the control needs it.
trans-unit.target: Utilize RowHeightInfoNeeded para obter as informações armazenadas altura quando o controlo necessita do mesmo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador altera a altura de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade está definida como `true` ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade está definida como um valor diferente de `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is used to track and store row height information so that it can be restored after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é utilizado para controlar e armazenar as informações da linha altura, para que pode ser restaurado após uma operação de ordenação.

trans-unit.source: To restore height information, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Para restaurar informações de altura, processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Note that this event occurs only when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que este evento ocorre apenas quando o utilizador altera a altura de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: If you change the height of a row programmatically, you must store the new height information at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Se alterar a altura de uma linha programaticamente, tem de armazenar as novas informações de altura, ao mesmo tempo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row loses input focus and is no longer the current row.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma linha perde o foco de entrada e deixa a linha atual.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight*> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight*>propriedade para um alterações de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> is painted.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> é pintado.

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event alone or in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event to customize the appearance of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar este evento individualmente ou em combinação com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>evento para personalizar o aspeto de linhas no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs> class to paint other parts: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Pode pintura linhas inteiras próprias ou paint partes específicas de linhas e utilizar os seguintes métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>classe para outras partes de pintura:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A>também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>classe para controlos padrão utilizando o tema actual de pintura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [composição de controlos com estilos visuais](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver a utilizar [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], também tem acesso a uma grande biblioteca de imagens padrão que pode utilizar com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>
