trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> is painted
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> é pintado

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event alone or in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to customize the appearance of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar este evento individualmente ou em combinação com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>evento para personalizar o aspeto de linhas no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs> class to paint other parts: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Pode pintura linhas inteiras próprias ou paint partes específicas de linhas e utilizar os seguintes métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>classe para outras partes de pintura:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A>também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>classe para controlos padrão utilizando o tema actual de pintura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [composição de controlos com estilos visuais](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver a utilizar [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], também tem acesso a uma grande biblioteca de imagens padrão que pode utilizar com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que contém todas as linhas no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Rows collection to manually populate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control instead of binding it to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a coleção de linhas para preencher manualmente um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo em vez de enlace-la a uma origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to manually add and insert rows.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo seguinte mostra como adicionar manualmente e inserir linhas.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have added four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> instances to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo assume que adicionou quatro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>instâncias para o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` [C#] ``` this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` For a detailed example that programmatically populates an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` [C#] ``` this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` para um exemplo de detalhado programaticamente preenche um desvinculado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar, consulte a secção de exemplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Rows include style information in addition to cell values.
trans-unit.target: Linhas incluem informações de estilo, além de valores de célula.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, you might want to add or insert rows based on existing rows that you have already styled.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, poderá adicionar ou inserir linhas com base nas linhas existentes que poderá já ter estilizados da seguinte.

trans-unit.source: You can do this using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ser feito utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Rows collection to modify the values in the control or to remove rows.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar a coleção de linhas para modificar os valores no controlo ou para remover as linhas.

trans-unit.source: You can modify values or remove rows regardless of whether the control is bound to an external data source.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar valores ou remover linhas independentemente se o controlo está vinculado a uma origem de dados externas.

trans-unit.source: If there is a data source, the changes are made directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Se existir uma origem de dados, as alterações são efetuadas diretamente à origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: You may still need to push the data source updates to a remote database, however.
trans-unit.target: Se ainda pretender emitir as atualizações de origem de dados para uma base de dados remoto, no entanto.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: vincular dados para o controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to modify cell values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo seguinte mostra como modificar os valores de célula através de programação.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` [C#] ``` // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` In addition to the standard collection capabilities, you can use the Rows collection to retrieve information about rows.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` [C#] ``` // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` para além das capacidades de recolha padrão, pode utilizar a coleção de linhas para obter informações sobre linhas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A> method to determine the state of a particular row.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A>método para determinar o estado de uma linha específica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A> methods to determine the number of rows or the combined height of rows in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A>métodos para determinar o número de linhas ou a altura combinada de linhas num estado específico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of a row with a particular state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o índice de uma linha com um estado específico, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to retrieve the index of the first selected row, and then use it to programmatically delete the row.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo seguinte mostra como obter o índice da primeira linha selecionada e, em seguida, utilizá-lo através de programação eliminar a linha.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` [C#] ``` Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` To improve performance, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> returned by the Rows property can include shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` [C#] ``` Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` para melhorar o desempenho, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>devolvido por linhas propriedade pode incluir partilhadas e sem linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: Linhas partilhadas partilham memória para reduzir o custo de um grande conjunto de registos.

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible when accessing the Rows property.
trans-unit.target: Se o conjunto de registos é muito grande, deve ter cuidado manter as linhas partilhadas quanto possível quando acedem a propriedade de linhas.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref> that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"> </xref> que contém todas as linhas no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a new row is added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois de uma nova linha é adicionada à <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Linhas no controlo não são automaticamente ordenadas quando são adicionadas novas linhas.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a RowsAdded event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para ordenar novas linhas na respetiva posição correta, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>método um processador de eventos RowsAdded.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador adiciona uma nova linha utilizando a linha para novos registos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor o processador para este evento é igual para o índice da localização da linha para novos registos, que é maior do que a linha acabou de adicionar uma nova.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you add rows programmatically, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> value is the index of the first row added.
trans-unit.target: Quando adiciona linhas programaticamente, no entanto, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>valor é o índice da primeira linha adicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, this event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event and can be used to create new records in your data store that you can then populate in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: No modo virtual, este evento ocorre antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>eventos e pode ser utilizado para criar novos registos no arquivo de dados que, em seguida, pode preencher no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo predefinido aplicado às células de linha do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo mostra as células utilizando estilos indicados pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade, que herda estilos de outras propriedades do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> célula</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in all rows, excluding header cells, the styles specified through the RowsDefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para células em todas as linhas, excluindo as células de cabeçalho, os estilos especificados através da propriedade RowsDefaultCellStyle é substituem os estilos especificados através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades e são substituídas pelos estilos especificados através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade, a obter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>com predefinição valores serão criados se a propriedade já não tiver sido acedida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode causar um impacto no desempenho quando ao obter esta propriedade de número de linhas.

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que possível, utilize um único <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>para definir esta propriedade para várias linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to apply to the row cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> para aplicar a células de linha de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre quando uma propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade está definida para um novo valor ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade está definida para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>com, pelo menos, um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row or rows are deleted from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma linha ou linhas são eliminadas do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When rows are deleted from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, the index numbers of subsequent rows are lowered to compensate.
trans-unit.target: Quando as linhas são eliminadas de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, os números de índice de linhas subsequentes são lowered para compensar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row changes state, such as losing or gaining input focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma linha muda de estado, por exemplo, se perde ou ganha o foco de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row that represents the template for all the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a linha que representa o modelo para todas as linhas no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want greater control over the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> rows than what is provided by the various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Por vezes, pretende maior controlo sobre o aspecto do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>linhas que o que é fornecido pelas várias <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Propriedades de estilo da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The RowTemplate property lets you create and initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> for use as a template by all rows, including the row for new records if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RowTemplate permite-lhe criar e inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>para utilização como um modelo por todas as linhas, incluindo a linha para novos registos se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you are setting default values for properties such as row height.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando estiver a definir os valores predefinidos para propriedades, tais como a altura de linha.

trans-unit.source: For example, you may want to increase the default row height in order to provide extra room beneath ordinary cell content for displaying content that spans multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, poderá aumentar a altura de linha predefinido para fornecer espaço adicional por baixo do conteúdo da célula comum para apresentar o conteúdo que abrange várias colunas.

trans-unit.source: Setting the row template is necessary when external data is displayed using custom types derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Definir o modelo de linha é necessário quando externos são apresentados os dados utilizando personalizados tipos derivados de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: With unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controls, you can programmatically populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection with instances of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: Com desvinculada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlos, através de programação pode povoar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>coleção com as instâncias do seu tipo de linha personalizadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When displaying external data, however, the rows are generated automatically, but they are based on the row template, which you can set to an instance of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: Quando se apresenta dados externos, no entanto, as linhas são geradas automaticamente, mas são baseadas no modelo de linha, pode definir para uma instância do seu tipo de linha personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: If this property has not been set the first time you retrieve its value, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> is created and returned.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade não foi definida na primeira vez, é possível obter o valor, um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>é criado e devolvida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> representing the row template.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> que representa o modelo de linha.

trans-unit.source: The specified row when setting this property has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*> property set.
trans-unit.target: A linha especificada quando definir esta propriedade tem o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*>propriedade definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's state changes from shared to unshared.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o estado de uma linha muda de partilhada para não partilhada.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event during development and testing to help identify code that causes rows to change from a shared to an unshared state.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento durante o desenvolvimento e testes para ajudar a identificar o código que faz com que as linhas a alterar um partilhado para um sem estado.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when scaling the control to display large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando o dimensionamento do controlo a apresentar grandes quantidades de dados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a row has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois de uma linha terminada a validação.

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> event.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é semelhante para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform post-processing on a row of values.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este evento para efetuar pós-processamento de uma linha de valores.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row is validating.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma linha está a ser validada.

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é semelhante para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform validation on all the values of a row.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este evento para efetuar a validação em todos os valores de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: If the row does not pass validation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se a linha não aprovado na validação, defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event prevents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName> events from occurring, and also prevents the user from leaving the invalid row and prevents the row from being saved to an external data source in data bound mode.
trans-unit.target: Cancelar este evento impede o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName>eventos ocorram e também impede que o utilizador deixar a linha inválida e impede que a linha que está a ser guardadas para uma origem de dados externo no modo de dados vinculados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user scrolls through the control contents.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador desloca através o conteúdo do controlo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of scroll bars to display for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de barras de deslocamento a apresentar para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of this property, scroll bars are shown only when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: Independentemente do valor desta propriedade, barras de deslocamento são apresentadas apenas se forem necessárias.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent scroll bars from appearing.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para impedir a apresentação barras de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to provide an alternative user interface (UI) for scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil, por exemplo, se pretender que a facultar uma interface de utilizador alternativo (IU) para deslocar o ecrã.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição desta propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property cannot be set because the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is unable to scroll due to a cell change that cannot be committed or canceled.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade não pode ser definido porque o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> não é possível se deslocar para devido a uma alteração de célula, que não é possível confirmar ou Cancelar.

trans-unit.source: Selects all the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona as células existentes no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está no modo de seleção de coluna e este método é denominado, cada coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`e cada linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Conversely, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está no modo de seleção de linha e este método é denominado, cada linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`e cada coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de células selecionadas pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedCells property is always populated regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectedCells é preenchida sempre, independentemente do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém um instantâneo só de leitura de seleção no momento que é referenciado.

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver a para uma cópia desta coleção, pode ser diferentes das real, subsequentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Estado em que o utilizador possa ter alterado a seleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, não deve funcionar numa cópia da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"></xref> that represents the cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"> </xref> que representa as células selecionadas pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de colunas selecionado pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> for the SelectedColumns property to be populated with selected columns.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>propriedade tem de ser definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>para a propriedade SelectedColumns ser preenchidos com colunas selecionadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém um instantâneo só de leitura de seleção no momento que é referenciado.

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver a para uma cópia desta coleção, pode ser diferentes das real, subsequentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Estado em que o utilizador possa ter alterado a seleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, não deve funcionar numa cópia da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"></xref> that represents the columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"> </xref> que representa as colunas selecionadas pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de linhas selecionado pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> for the SelectedRows property to be populated with selected rows.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>propriedade tem de ser definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>para a propriedade SelectedRows ser preenchidos com linhas selecionadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém um instantâneo só de leitura de seleção no momento que é referenciado.

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver a para uma cópia desta coleção, pode ser diferentes das real, subsequentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Estado em que o utilizador possa ter alterado a seleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You should therefore not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Não, por conseguinte, deve funcionar numa cópia da coleção.

trans-unit.source: To programmatically select a row, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar programaticamente uma linha, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"></xref> that contains the rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"> </xref> que contém as linhas selecionadas pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a selecção actual é alterada.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre sempre que estão selecionadas células ou a seleção, será cancelada, quer através de programação, quer por ação do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, este evento é útil quando pretende apresentar a soma das células atualmente selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property, the SelectionChanged event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando altera o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade, o evento SelectionChanged ocorre antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any SelectionChanged event handler accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property at this time will get its previous value.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer aceder de processador de eventos do SelectionChanged o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade neste momento, irá obter o valor anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica como as células do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> podem ser selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the SelectionMode property clears the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o valor da propriedade SelectionMode anula a seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição desta propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*> property of one or more columns is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>de uma ou mais colunas for definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Este membro substitui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the width or height values exceeds the maximum value of 8,388,607.
trans-unit.target: Um ou ambos os valores de largura ou altura excede o valor máximo de 8,388,607.

trans-unit.source: Sets the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: Define a célula atualmente ativa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo utiliza este método, sempre que alterar a célula actual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This method changes the current cell without changing the selection and optionally without validating the previous cell or changing the selection anchor cell.
trans-unit.target: Este método altera a célula actual sem alterar a seleção e, opcionalmente, sem a validar a célula anterior ou alterar a célula de âncora de seleção.

trans-unit.source: The anchor cell is the first cell of a block of multiple cells that the user can select by holding down the SHIFT key and clicking the last cell of the block.
trans-unit.target: A célula de âncora é a primeira célula de um bloco de células vários que o utilizador pode seleccionar premida a tecla SHIFT e clicando em último célula do bloco.

trans-unit.source: If `rowIndex` and `columnIndex` are both -1, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se `rowIndex` e `columnIndex` são ambas -1, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade devolve `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the new current cell the anchor cell for a subsequent multicell selection using the SHIFT key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para tornar a célula actual novo a célula de âncora para uma seleção multicell subsequente utilizando a tecla SHIFT; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to validate the value in the old current cell and cancel the change if validation fails; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para validar o valor da célula actual antigo e cancelar a alteração se a validação falhar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is being set as a result of a mouse click; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula actual está a ser definida como resultado de um clique do rato; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell was successfully set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula actual foi definida com êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1, and rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que 0 ou superior ao número de colunas no controlo menos 1, e rowIndex não for -1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1, and columnIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é inferior a 0 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1, e columnIndex não for -1.

trans-unit.source: The specified cell has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A célula especificada tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>valor da propriedade de <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: -or- This method was called for a reason other than the underlying data source being reset, and another thread is currently executing this method.
trans-unit.target: - ou - este método foi chamado por um motivo que não seja a origem de dados subjacente redefinido e outro thread está atualmente a executar este método.

trans-unit.source: The new current cell tried to enter edit mode, but its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A célula actual novo tentou introduzir o modo de edição, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>propriedade indicam uma classe que deriva de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> e implementa <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the cell with the specified row and column indexes.
trans-unit.target: Altera o estado de seleção da célula com os índices de linha e coluna especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo utiliza este método, sempre que alterar o estado de seleção de uma célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: As alterações de estado de seleção independentemente atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>valor da propriedade e sem alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando pretender implementar os suas próprias modos de selecção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the cell; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to cancel the selection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para selecionar a célula; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para cancelar a seleção da célula.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que 0 ou superior ao número de colunas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é inferior a 0 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: As alterações de estado de seleção independentemente atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>valor da propriedade e sem alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para selecionar a coluna; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para cancelar a seleção da coluna.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que 0 ou superior ao número de colunas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the row with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Altera o estado de seleção da linha com o índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo utiliza este método, sempre que alterar o estado de seleção de uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: As alterações de estado de seleção independentemente atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>valor da propriedade e sem alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando pretender implementar os suas próprias modos de selecção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
