trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the row; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to cancel the selection of the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para selecionar a linha; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para cancelar a seleção da linha.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexé menor que 0 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show cell errors.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve mostrar erros de célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a red glyph will appear in a cell that fails validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um glifo vermelho irá aparecer uma célula que falhar na validação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not ToolTips will show when the mouse pointer pauses on a cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se é ou não ser mostradas quando o ponteiro do rato pausa sobre uma célula.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not `null` or the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, and a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor desta propriedade é `true` e o ponteiro do rato está sobre uma célula, célula apresenta uma descrição, quando uma das seguintes condições for satisfeita:-o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade não é `null` ou o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade é `true`e um processador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>evento define a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para um valor diferente de <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property of the cell has a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>propriedade da célula tem um valor diferente de <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect when there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade não tem qualquer efeito quando existe um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>processador de eventos porque a obter o valor da propriedade automaticamente desencadeia o evento e devolve o texto da descrição de eventos especificado processador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: - The cell value is truncated in the cell display.
trans-unit.target: -O valor de célula é truncado na apresentação de célula.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>valor da propriedade é <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, o valor total do valor de célula truncada é apresentado na descrição.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cell ToolTips are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiverem ativada célula descrições; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the editing glyph is visible in the row header of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se é ou não a imagem de edição está visível no cabeçalho de linha da célula a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O cabeçalho de linha apresentará uma imagem de edição que se assemelha um lápis quando a célula actual está em modo de edição e o utilizador efetuou alterações à célula.

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph is colored by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de edição é colorida utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>propriedade da célula de cabeçalho de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely.
trans-unit.target: Não é composto de glifo se não existir espaço suficiente para apresentá-la completamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row header cell has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver a célula de cabeçalho de linha respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>propriedade definida, o glifo é removida se não existir espaço suficiente para o texto e de glifo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A> property in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: A apresentação de imagem de edição é controlada pelo valor o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>propriedade no modo virtual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, é controlado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: The standard glyph is not publicly exposed.
trans-unit.target: O glifo padrão não está exposto publicamente.

trans-unit.source: To customize the glyph, you can create a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> class.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar o glifo, pode criar um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing glyph is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a imagem de edição está visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers will display error glyphs for each row that contains a data entry error.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os cabeçalhos de linha vai apresentar glyphs de erro para cada linha que contém um erro de entrada de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>propriedade indica se existe um erro das células numa linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty>, then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>está definido para um valor diferente de <xref:System.String.Empty>, em seguida, uma imagem de erro (![ErrorProvider ícone](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider ícone")) é apresentado no cabeçalho de linha.</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A largura predefinida do cabeçalho da linha inclui tenha espaço suficiente para apresentar a imagem de erro, se pretende ou não é apresentado o glifo.

trans-unit.source: If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: Se o tamanho do cabeçalho de linha é ajustado para que não existe espaço suficiente para apresentar o glifo completamente, o glifo não é composto.

trans-unit.source: Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: Porque os cabeçalhos de linha podem apresentar texto e glyphs, conteúdo do cabeçalho é apresentado por prioridade, da seguinte forma: 1.

trans-unit.source: Text displayed in the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: Texto apresentado na célula de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de edição.

trans-unit.source: The error glyph.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de erro.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a largura de linha é diminuída, a imagem de erro desaparece em primeiro lugar, em seguida, o glifo padrão e texto.

trans-unit.source: Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizadores avançados podem personalizar a imagem de erro ao desenvolver uma personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> indicates there is an error; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> indica um erro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control using an implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ordena os conteúdos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar a utilização de uma implementação do <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite personalização avançada da funcionalidade de ordenação da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName> interface as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar uma operação de ordenação altamente personalizada, pode escrever um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>eventos e chamar este método com uma instância de uma classe que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName>interface como parâmetro.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you will typically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, normalmente, irá definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>para desativar a ordenação automática e para deixar espaço para um ordenação glifo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Ao ordenar por colunas definidas para o modo de ordenação programática, deve apresentar o glifo ordenação por si, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method works only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Este método funciona apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade não está definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando vincular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo a uma origem de dados externos, tem de utilizar as operações de ordenação fornecidas por essa origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador fornecer a sua própria origem de dados através da implementação de modo virtual, deve também processar as operações de ordenação por si.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método automaticamente define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> that performs the custom sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação de <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>que efetua a operação de ordenação personalizada.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: comparer is .
trans-unit.target: compareris .

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>. -or- <>*> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Ordena os conteúdos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo ascendente ou descendente ordem baseado nos conteúdos da coluna especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method sorts the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> by comparing values in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Este método ordena os conteúdos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>comparando os valores na coluna especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the sort operation will use the <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A> method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, a operação de ordenação irá utilizar o <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>método para comparar os pares de células na coluna com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Para colunas com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>propriedades forem definidas automaticamente e é apresentado o glifo ordenação adequado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para colunas com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, deve apresentar o ordenação glifo através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: Pode personalizar a operação de ordenação utilizada por este método pelo processamento do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade não foi definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade foi definida, este método funciona para apenas colunas de dados vinculados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound columns have had their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set.
trans-unit.target: Colunas vinculadas a dados tem tido as respetivas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para devolver `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo contém colunas vinculadas e desvinculadas, tem de implementar o modo virtual, para manter os valores das colunas desvinculados quando o controlo está ordenado por uma coluna vinculada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property to `true` and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Pode fazê-lo definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade `true` e processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the column is editable, you should also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: Se a coluna for editável, também deve processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo virtual, consulte [como: implementar o modo Virtual no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Ordenar por colunas desvinculadas quando o controlo está vinculado a dados não é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The column by which to sort the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coluna pela qual ordenar os conteúdos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The specified column is not part of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coluna especificada não faz parte deste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property has been set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound*> property of the specified column returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <> </> *> propriedade foi definida e o <> </> *> propriedade da coluna especificada devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: dataGridViewColumnis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound*> property of the specified column returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e <> </> *> propriedade da coluna especificada devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property does not implement the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> interface. -or- The object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o objeto especificado pelo <> </> *> propriedade não implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref> interface. - ou - o objeto especificado pelo <> </> *> propriedade tem um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> valor da propriedade de <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> compares two cell values to perform a sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> compara dois valores de célula para efetuar uma operação de ordenação.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade não está definida e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>valor da propriedade é `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event compares pairs of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Este evento compara pares de células na coluna a ser ordenados.

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: -Ocorre apenas quando o utilizador clica no cabeçalho da coluna com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, ou quando chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29>de sobrecarga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando este evento ocorre para uma coluna com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, deve apresentar o ordenação glifo através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para ordenar linhas utilizando os valores das células na coluna de um ou em várias colunas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>Propriedades para comparar os valores na coluna especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>Propriedades para aceder aos valores existentes nas outras colunas através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control completes a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo concluir uma operação de ordenação.

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` and the control is sorted by an unbound column.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade está definida como `true` e o controlo está ordenado por uma coluna desvinculada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column by which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coluna pela qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> conteúdos atualmente são ordenados.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not sorted, this property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>não está ordenada, esta propriedade irá devolver `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the column indicated by this property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, it will display a sorting glyph based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando a coluna indicada por esta propriedade tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, apresentará um ordenação glifo com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando a coluna tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, deve apresentar o ordenação glifo através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O valor desta propriedade não é significativo quando ordenar o controlo de ordenação personalizada a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a ordenação personalizada, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29>método e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> by which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> através do qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> conteúdos atualmente são ordenados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control are sorted in ascending or descending order, or are not sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os itens a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo são ordenados ordem ascendente ou descendente ou não são ordenados.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to determine which sorting glyph appears when the column specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada para determinar qual glifo ordenação é apresentada quando a coluna especificada pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>propriedade tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display and hide the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando a coluna tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, tem de apresentar e ocultar o ordenação glifo por si através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you can display the sorting glyph, but space is not reserved for it if the column is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Quando a coluna tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, pode apresentar o glifo ordenação, mas não está reservado espaço para o mesmo se a coluna é automaticamente redimensionada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O valor desta propriedade não é significativo quando ordenar o controlo de ordenação personalizada a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a ordenação personalizada, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>método e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order rather than moving focus to the next cell in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a tecla TAB move o foco para o controlo seguinte na ordem de tabulação em vez de mover o foco para a célula seguinte no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` allows the TAB key to move the focus through the grid of cells.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade como `false` permite a tecla de tabulação mover o foco através da grelha de células.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the cell focus changes when the given TAB key combinations are pressed.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte descreve como o foco de célula é alterado quando as determinada combinações de teclas do SEPARADOR são premidas.

trans-unit.source: |Key combination|Result| |---------------------|------------| |TAB|If the StandardTab property is `false`, the focus moves to the next cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: | Combinação de chave | Resultado | |---------------------|------------| | SEPARADOR | Se a propriedade StandardTab for `false`, move o foco para a célula seguinte na linha.

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the last cell in the row, the focus moves to the first cell in the next row.
trans-unit.target: Se o foco incide na última célula na linha, move o foco para a primeira célula na linha seguinte.

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the last cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the focus moves to the next control in the tab order.| |SHIFT+TAB|If StandardTab is `false`, the focus moves to the previous cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Se o foco incide na última célula no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, se move o foco para o controlo seguinte na ordem de tabulação. | | SHIFT + TAB | Se for StandardTab `false`, move o foco para a célula anterior na linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the first cell in the row, the focus moves to the last cell in the previous row.
trans-unit.target: Se o foco está a ser a primeira célula na linha, o foco para o último move célula na linha anterior.

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the first cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the focus moves to the previous control in the tab order.| |CTRL+TAB|The focus moves to the next control in the tab order.|
trans-unit.target: Se o foco está a ser a primeira célula no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, se move o foco ao controlo anterior na ordem de tabulação. | | CTRL + TAB | Move o foco para o controlo seguinte na ordem de tabulação. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tecla TAB move o foco para o controlo seguinte na ordem de tabulação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header cell located in the upper left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a célula de cabeçalho localizada no canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows you to set a value for the cell, associate a shortcut menu with it, or perform any other operations you can perform on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade permite-lhe definir um valor para a célula, associar um menu de atalho com o mesmo ou efetuar quaisquer outras operações que pode efetuar no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: In applications designed for use with right-to-left languages, the cell represented by this property is typically in the upper-right corner.
trans-unit.target: Aplicações concebidas para utilização com idiomas de direita para a esquerda, a célula representada por esta propriedade é, normalmente, no canto superior direito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> located at the upper left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> localizada no canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the cell at the specified location to update its error text.
trans-unit.target: Força a célula na localização especificada para atualizar o seu texto de erro.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you maintain cell error text yourself by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método quando mantém texto de erro de célula por si ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método quando altera o texto de erro armazenado para a célula especificada.

trans-unit.source: This will invalidate the cell, forcing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated error text through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Isto invalidará a célula forçar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo para obter o texto de erro atualizado através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Although you can use this method to update errors for header cells, column header cells do not display error glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Apesar de poder utilizar este método para atualizar os erros de células de cabeçalho, células de cabeçalho de coluna não são apresentados os glifos de erro.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell to update, or -1 to indicate a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna da célula update ou -1 para indicar uma célula de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell to update, or -1 to indicate a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula update ou -1 para indicar uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que -1 ou superior ao número de colunas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é inferior a -1 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to update its display of the cell at the specified location based on its new value, applying any automatic sizing modes currently in effect.
trans-unit.target: Força o controlo para atualizar a apresentação da célula na localização especificada com base no respetivo valor nova, aplicar qualquer modos de dimensionamento automático atualmente em efeito.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you maintain cell values in virtual mode and you update a value in your custom data cache outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método quando manter os valores no modo virtual e atualize um valor na sua cache de dados personalizados fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: This method invalidates the cell, forcing the control to retrieve the new value through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event handler and apply any automatic sizing modes that are in effect.
trans-unit.target: Este método invalida célula, forçar o controlo para obter o valor novo através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>processador de eventos e aplicar os modos de dimensionamento automático que estão em vigor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column index of the cell with the new value.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero de coluna da célula com o novo valor.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell with the new value.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero de linha da célula com o novo valor.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than zero or greater than the number of columns in the control minus one.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que zero ou superior ao número de colunas no controlo menos um.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the control minus one.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é menor que zero ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos um.

trans-unit.source: Forces the row at the given row index to update its error text.
trans-unit.target: Força a linha no índice de linha especificado para atualizar o seu texto de erro.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you maintain row error text yourself by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil quando mantém o texto de erro de linha por si ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método quando altera o texto de erro armazenado para a linha especificado.

trans-unit.source: This will force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated text through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Isto irá forçar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo para obter o texto atualizado através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da linha para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnão se encontra no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Forces the rows in the given range to update their error text.
trans-unit.target: Força as linhas no intervalo especificado para atualizar o seu texto de erro.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you maintain row error text yourself by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil quando mantém o texto de erro de linha por si ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified rows.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método quando altera o texto de erro armazenado para linhas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: This will force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated text through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Isto irá forçar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo para obter o texto atualizado através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first row in the set of rows to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira linha no conjunto de linhas atualizar.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last row in the set of rows to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da última linha no conjunto de linhas atualizar.

trans-unit.source: rowIndexStart is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexStartnão se encontra no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexEnd is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndexEnd não se encontra no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexEnd is less than rowIndexStart.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndexEnd é inferior a rowIndexStart.

trans-unit.source: Forces the specified row or rows to update their height information.
trans-unit.target: Força a linha especificada ou linhas para as suas informações de altura de atualizar.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you maintain row heights yourself using handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> events.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil quando manter heights linha utilizando processadores para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method whenever you change the stored row heights outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método, sempre que alterar os heights linha armazenado fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>

trans-unit.source: This will force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated height information through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Isto irá forçar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo para obter as informações de altura atualizado através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first row to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira linha para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to update the specified row and all subsequent rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para atualizar a linha especificada e todas as linhas subsequentes.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than 0 and updateToEnd is .
trans-unit.target: rowIndexé inferior a 0 e updateToEnd é .

trans-unit.target: Obtém o predefinido ou o valor especificado para um utilizador a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property, its value can change depending on the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Embora pode definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>propriedade, pode alterar o valor consoante a localização do ponteiro do rato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property in its normal state, which is either its default value, or a value specified in code.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para obter o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>propriedade no respetivo estado normal, que é o valor predefinido ou um valor especificado no código.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> representando o valor de normal a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.target: Obtém a barra de deslocamento vertical do controlo.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> que representa a barra de deslocamento vertical.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de pixels através do qual o controlo é deslocar verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels by which the control is scrolled vertically.
trans-unit.target: O número de pixels através do qual o controlo é deslocar verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether you have provided your own data-management operations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se forneceu as suas próprias operações de gestão de dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode is designed for use with very large stores of data.
trans-unit.target: Modo virtual foi concebido para utilização com um grande arquivos de dados.

trans-unit.source: When the VirtualMode property is `true`, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with a set number of rows and columns and then handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to populate the cells.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade VirtualMode está `true`, cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>com um número de conjunto de linhas e colunas e o identificador de, em seguida, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>eventos para preencher as células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode requires implementation of an underlying data cache to handle the population, editing, and deletion of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cells based on actions of the user.
trans-unit.target: Modo virtual requer a implementação de uma cache de dados subjacente para processar a população, edição e eliminação de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>células com base em ações do utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar o modo virtual, consulte [como: implementar o modo Virtual no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You must use virtual mode to maintain the values of unbound columns when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is in bound mode.
trans-unit.target: É necessário utilizar o modo virtual para manter os valores das colunas desvinculados quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo está no modo vinculado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Sorting by unbound columns in bound mode is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Ordenar por colunas desvinculadas no modo vinculada não é suportada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> uses data-management operations that you provide; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> utiliza as operações de gestão de dados que fornecem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes window messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens de janela.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the base class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método na classe de base.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.
